name: Perseids
description:
@AergiaGame - aergia.dk - itch profile Music by Andreas Busk Hold 'C' to look at the stars

Perseids is a slow, short and probably rather dull game about walking down to the harbour in the middle of the night during a meteor shower, staring at the sky and having awkward conversations with strangers.

Originally an unfinished project for the 'No Comfort' jam back in September 2016 which tasked participants to make something out of their comfort zone, using techniques or content they were unfamiliar with. So I used pixel graphics and told a true story using an engine I never used before. Godot is an interesting open-source game engine and well worth a try if you're looking for something other than Unity/Unreal.

Instructions
  • Move with arrows
  • Jump with X
  • Hold C to look at the stars
  • Press F10 to toggle full screen
